org.dayatang.i18n

Interface HierarchicalI18nService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    I18nService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractI18nService, ResourceBundleI18nService

    public interface HierarchicalI18nService
extends I18nService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      I18nService getParentMessageSource()
      Return the parent of this I18nService, or null if none.
      void setParentMessageSource(I18nService parent)
      Set the parent that will be used to try to resolve messages that this object can't resolve.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dayatang.i18n.I18nService

        getMessage, getMessage

    • Method Detail

      • setParentMessageSource

        void setParentMessageSource(I18nService parent)
        Set the parent that will be used to try to resolve messages that this object can't resolve.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent I18nService that will be used to resolve messages that this object can't resolve. May be null, in which case no further resolution is possible.

      • getParentMessageSource

        I18nService getParentMessageSource()
        Return the parent of this I18nService, or null if none.
